scripts.test: cd users; npm run test; cd ../comments; npm run test; cd ../questions; npm run test;
scripts.coverage: cd users; npm run test-coverage; cd../comments; npm run test-coverage; cd../questions; npm run test-coverage;
scripts.migrate: cd users; npm run migrate; cd ../comments; npm run migrate; cd ../questions; npm run migrate;
scripts.seed: cd users; npm run db:seed:all; cd ../comments; npm run db:seed:all; cd ../questions; npm run db:seed:all;
